CRITICAL_REMINDERS: PRESERVE THE COMPLETE LINE COMPANION TEXT - do not summarize, trim, or paraphrase
Copy the ENTIRE section for each line verbatim - all paragraphs, all sentences
Include exaltation/detriment information if present in the source
Behavioral axes must describe OBSERVABLE ACTIONS, not internal states or awareness
Shadow axis shows ACTUAL DYSFUNCTION - what goes wrong behaviorally, not just conceptually
Keywords must be behavioral traits, not mystical concepts
Source attribution must match exactly: 'Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks'
Each behavioral_axis and shadow_axis must be ONE SENTENCE describing what this person DOES
FULL_TEXT_PRESERVATION: The 'full_text' field must contain the COMPLETE, UNEDITED Line Companion section for this line
Do NOT trim for length - we need every word Ra wrote about this line
Do NOT summarize or paraphrase - copy verbatim
Include all paragraphs, all nuance, all context
This is the PRIMARY data - everything else (keywords, axes) is derived FROM this text
MECHANICAL_PRECISION_RULES: ALWAYS consider the gate's CENTER location (Head/Ajna/Throat/G/Ego/Sacral/Spleen/Solar Plexus/Root)
ALWAYS consider the gate's CIRCUIT (Individual/Tribal/Collective; Knowing/Sensing/Understanding/etc.)
Individual circuit gates: Include 'melancholy', 'mutation', 'pulse' themes - creativity can't be forced
Collective/Understanding (Logic): Patterns, formulas, proof/testing. DO NOT equate 'logic' with Ajna—logic spans centers (e.g., 4/17 in Ajna, 62 in Throat)
Tribal circuit gates: Bargains, support, resources, family/community bonds
Collective circuit gates: Sharing, patterns, abstract thinking, universal themes
G Center gates: Identity, direction, love - NOT work or productivity
Ajna Center gates: Mental conceptualizing - NOT instinctive knowing
Spleen Center gates: Instinctive, in-the-moment awareness - NOT mental processing
Root Center gates: Pressure, stress, drive - often adrenal
Sacral Center gates: Life force, response, work capacity - Generator energy
LINE_ARCHETYPE_PRECISION: Line 1 (Foundation): Introspection, research, insecurity without solid base - NOT projection
Line 2 (Hermit/Natural): Natural talent, called out, projection FROM others - NOT projecting outward
Line 3 (Martyr): Trial-and-error, experimentation, learning through mistakes - bonds made/broken
Line 4 (Opportunist): Externalization, network, friendship foundation - role-playing to learn
Line 5 (Heretic): PROJECTION FIELD - others project onto them, seduction, practical solutions, reputation at stake
Line 6 (Role Model): Three life phases - trial (0-30), roof/withdrawal (30-50), role model (50+), objectivity
LANGUAGE_REFINEMENTS: Use 'auric boundaries' or 'non-interference' instead of 'isolation' (unless truly hermit mode)
Use 'projection field' for 5th lines - they receive projections, don't just project
Use 'role-playing to learn' instead of 'lying' for 4th line (unless Ra explicitly says 'liar')
Use 'melancholy as fuel' for Individual circuit gates (not pathology)
Use 'mental pressure' for Ajna gates, 'instinctive knowing' for Spleen gates
Use 'creative timing' instead of 'waiting' for Individual gates (waiting is Type strategy, not gate theme)
Use 'externalization' for 4th lines (they learn by saying yes first, then figuring it out)
NO Type/Authority coaching - don't write 'wait for invitation/response' in gate text (that's Type strategy)
For Solar Plexus gates: avoid 'control emotions' framing; use 'rides/acknowledges wave; times engagement'
For Spleen gates: avoid mental language; use 'instantaneous instinct', 'in-the-moment sensing'
Line 2: 'Called out by others' ≠ 'seeking audience' - if they're chasing attention, that's shadow
Line 5: Must acknowledge APPLAUSE AND BLAME dynamics - shadow often = performing the role to satisfy projections

GOOD_EXAMPLES.behavioral_axis: Waits for creative impulses without forcing them, letting timing unfold naturally
GOOD_EXAMPLES.shadow_axis: Tries to control creative output through willpower and ego, becoming unstable and frustrated

BAD_EXAMPLES.behavioral_axis: Recognizes that timing follows its own law and cannot be forced

GATE_MECHANICS_QUICK_REFERENCE.WARNING: DO NOT trust hardcoded circuit lists - they contain errors. Use CENTER_MAP only (which is accurate), then look up circuit from canonical gate metadata.

REQUIRE_META_LOOKUP.instruction: Read circuit metadata from s3-data/gates/_meta/gate-index.json (fields: center, circuit_family, subcircuit). DO NOT infer from memory or quick lists.

CENTER_THEMES.G: Identity, direction, love - NOT work or productivity
CENTER_THEMES.AJNA: Mental conceptualizing, formulas, patterns - NOT instinctive
CENTER_THEMES.SPLEEN: Instinctive, in-the-moment awareness - NOT mental processing
CENTER_THEMES.SACRAL: Life force, response, work capacity - Generator energy
CENTER_THEMES.SOLAR_PLEXUS: Emotional wave, awareness through time - NOT control emotions
CENTER_THEMES.HEAD: Mental pressure, inspiration, questions

1.1.hd_title: [Exact line title from Line Companion - copy verbatim, no interpretation]
1.1.full_text: [COMPLETE, UNEDITED Line Companion text for this line. Copy every word, every paragraph, every sentence. Do NOT summarize or trim. This is the primary source data that everything else is derived from.]
1.1.behavioral_axis: [One sentence describing OBSERVABLE INTERPERSONAL BEHAVIOR in healthy expression. What does this person DO in relationships/groups? Use grounded, concrete language. Avoid: 'recognizes', 'understands', 'knows'. Prefer: 'waits', 'protects', 'confronts', 'soothes', 'withdraws'.]
1.1.shadow_axis: [One sentence describing OBSERVABLE DISTORTED BEHAVIOR. What does this person DO when wounded/unhealthy? Use concrete verbs. Show the actual dysfunction, not just the concept.]
1.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

1.2.full_text: [COMPLETE, UNEDITED Line Companion text - all paragraphs, all context]
keywords: [psychological stance - PROJECTION FROM OTHERS, not projecting outward]
1.2.behavioral_axis: [2nd line = HERMIT/NATURAL. They have natural talent, get CALLED OUT by others. They don't project - others project ONTO them. Use: 'naturally embodies', 'called out', 'withdraws when not recognized'. AVOID: 'projects answers outward' (that's 5th line)]
1.2.shadow_axis: [Observable behavior when distorted - show the actual dysfunction]
1.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

1.3.full_text: [COMPLETE, UNEDITED Line Companion text - preserve all nuance]
1.3.behavioral_axis: [3rd line = MARTYR/EXPERIMENTER. Explicitly use 'trial-and-error', 'experiments', 'learns through mistakes'. They discover what works by discovering what doesn't. Bonds made and broken through experience.]
1.3.shadow_axis: [Observable behavior when distorted - often premature fixing, avoiding the experimental process, or rationalizing repeated mistakes]
1.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

1.4.full_text: [COMPLETE, UNEDITED Line Companion text - every word matters]
1.4.behavioral_axis: [4th line = OPPORTUNIST/EXTERNALIZER. They learn by SAYING YES FIRST, then figuring it out. Use 'externalizes', 'role-plays to learn', 'says yes then races to understand'. Network/friendship foundation is critical. AVOID harsh 'liar' language unless Ra explicitly uses it - prefer 'role-playing as learning mechanism'.]
1.4.shadow_axis: [Observable behavior when distorted - confuses fantasy with fact, faces humiliation when time reveals the gap between pretense and reality]
1.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

1.5.full_text: [COMPLETE, UNEDITED Line Companion text - full context required for star system scoring]
1.5.behavioral_axis: [5th line = HERETIC/PROJECTION FIELD. CRITICAL: Others project expectations ONTO them (savior/heretic). They must deliver practical solutions. Use 'projection field', 'holds steady under projection', 'seduces energy', 'reputation at stake'. They don't just project - they RECEIVE projections and must navigate them. Include 'recognition' themes.]
1.5.shadow_axis: [Observable behavior when distorted - performs the role to satisfy projections, becomes cynical from always needing to seduce energy, bitter when others get credit]
1.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

1.6.full_text: [COMPLETE, UNEDITED Line Companion text - preserve all wisdom and context]
1.6.behavioral_axis: [6th line = ROLE MODEL. Three life phases: trial/experimentation (0-30), roof/withdrawal (30-50), role model/wisdom (50+). Develops objectivity over time. Use 'objectivity', 'role model', 'wisdom through experience', 'timeless vs fashion'. Early life feels subjective; true objectivity matures post-Saturn return. Use 'consequences' instead of 'punishment' for shadow.]
1.6.shadow_axis: [Observable behavior when distorted - mistakes subjective preference for universal truth, refuses understanding and accepts consequences as price of excess, dismissive of incomplete processes]
1.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

full_text.notes: Must be the COMPLETE Line Companion section - no summarization, no trimming. This is the primary source data.

behavioral_axis.required_style: Observable interpersonal action; use concrete verbs (waits, protects, withdraws, confronts, soothes, controls, seduces, externalizes, experiments)

shadow_axis.required_style: Observable dysfunctional behavior; show what goes wrong in practice, not just conceptually

keywords.style: Behavioral traits (not mystical concepts); observable actions and interpersonal patterns

mechanics_checks: Assert: center exists in CENTER_MAP and gate is in CENTER_MAP[center]
Assert: center/circuit_family/subcircuit exactly match gate-index.json for this gate
If circuit_family=='Individual' then text includes one of ['melancholy', 'mutation', 'pulse', 'creative timing'] (non-dogmatic usage)
If line==2 then behavioral_axis contains 'called out' or 'natural' or 'hermit' (NOT 'projects outward')
If line==3 then behavioral_axis contains 'trial-and-error' or 'experiments' or 'learns through mistakes'
If line==4 then behavioral_axis includes one of ['externalizes', 'role-plays', 'network', 'says yes then learns']
If line==5 then behavioral_axis contains 'projection field' or a synonym meaning 'receives projections'
If line==6 then behavioral_axis includes one of ['objectivity', 'role model', 'wisdom', 'roof']
If center=='AJNA' then avoid 'instinctive' language; use 'mental', 'conceptual', 'formulas'
If center=='SPLEEN' then avoid 'mental' language; use 'instinctive', 'in-the-moment', 'survival'
If center=='G' then avoid 'work' or 'productivity' framing; use 'identity', 'direction', 'love'
If center=='SOLAR_PLEXUS' then avoid 'control emotions'; use 'rides wave', 'acknowledges wave', 'times engagement'

BEFORE_SUBMITTING: ✓ FULL TEXT is complete and unedited - no summarization
✓ Checked gate's CENTER and CIRCUIT from canonical gate-index.json

✓ Applied circuit-specific themes (Individual = melancholy/mutation; Collective/Understanding (Logic) = patterns/formulas/proof; Collective/Sensing (Abstract) = experience/story/memory; Tribal = bargains/resources/kinship)
✓ Applied line archetype correctly (2nd=hermit, 3rd=trial-and-error, 4th=externalization, 5th=projection field, 6th=role model)
✓ Used concrete action verbs, not abstract awareness verbs
✓ Behavioral/shadow axes are ONE SENTENCE each
✓ Keywords are behavioral traits, not mystical concepts
✓ Language is grounded (auric boundaries not isolation, consequences not punishment, role-playing not lying)
✓ Individual circuit gates include melancholy/mutation themes
✓ G Center gates avoid work/productivity framing

_OUTPUT_RULES.instruction: Output JSON only, no prose. If any validator fails, auto-fix and re-emit.
